author: jim
msg: Document use of the DefaultRuntimeDir directive.

author: sascharodekamp
msg: Changed the FileReader to a BufferedReader during script loading. The file reader throws an exception when the file path contains spaces (which are encoded). The result was that scripts aren't loaded and pages only showed an error message. Working with an InputStream solves this issue.

msg: Ability to destroy a MessageContext ThreadLocal variable
